p:
For all SNPs in the GBA locus, putative spatial regulatory connections were identified. We used the contextualize developmental SNPs using 3D information (CoDeS3D) algorithm
30 ( https://github.com/Genome3d/codes3d-v1; Supplementary Fig. 1) to integrate both spatial interaction (Hi‚ÄêC data) plus expression data (eQTL) to identify genes whose transcript levels depend on the identity of the SNP (ie, spatial eQTL).
30 ,
31
